snippet.title: First Images From Highlander, Deadpool 4, Star Wars, How to Train Your Dragon 2... KinoCheck News
snippet.description:
This time in the #KinoCheckNews “Highlander”, “Deadpool 4”, “Star Wars”, “Black Panther 3”, "How to Train Your Dragon 2" etc.| App ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App | Best Movie News Show | All News https://KinoCheck.com/news

00:00 First Images from the Highlander Reboot Starring Henry Cavill
Henry Cavill has taken on the lead role in the reboot of the fantasy classic "Highlander". Now he's sharing the first images from the film with his fans.
https://kinocheck.com/news/2s2qyk

01:11 Rumor: Work on Deadpool 4 Has Begun!
The mercenary with the big mouth returns! After the huge success of "Deadpool & Wolverine", fans are eagerly awaiting a fourth film in the series – and now the time has come. As Puck magazine reports, Ryan Reynolds is indeed working hard on "Deadpool 4"!
https://kinocheck.com/news/3obf4w

02:03 New Trailers

02:46 The Beekeeper 2: Release Date for the Jason Statham Sequel Announced
The Hollywood star returns in "The Beekeeper 2"! Following the success of the first film, the sequel to the action thriller is in the pipeline. Amazon MGM has now officially announced the release date. And with "Shelter", another Jason Statham action film is just around the corner
https://kinocheck.com/news/xj3nbx

03:38 New Update on Taika Waititi's Star Wars Movie
The as yet untitled film by "Thor" director Taika Waititi has not yet been affected by this. Kathleen Kennedy recently spoke briefly about the current status of the project in her "exit interview" with industry magazine Deadline. Taika Waititi himself has also revealed a few details about his film!
https://kinocheck.com/news/3km831

04:33 New Star Trek Movie: Chris Pine Gives Kirk Fans Little Hope
Chris Pine commented on a possible return as Enterprise captain James T. Kirk. However, his words give fans little reason for hope.
https://kinocheck.com/news/nlz06j

05:19 Aaron Pierre in Talks to Become the New Black Panther
Hot rumors about the casting of the new Black Panther! After "F1" star Damson Idris has already been linked to the role several times, another actor is now throwing his hat into the ring. As insider Daniel Richtman revealed, "Rebel Ridge" star Aaron Pierre is now also in talks with Marvel.
https://kinocheck.com/news/uf69m9

06:13 No Theatrical Release! The Gundam Film Starring Sydney Sweeney Will Be Released on Netflix
According to Deadline, the "Gundam" live-action feature adaptation starring Sydney Sweeney won't be released in movie theaters. Instead, it will go straight to Netflix. That's not to say a theatrical release is completely off the table. After all, the streaming service has occasionally released movies in theaters for a limited time in the past. However, this has not been officially confirmed yet – so we'll just have to wait and see.
https://kinocheck.com/news/sitpju/

07:05 How to Train Your Dragon 2: Start of Filming and Casting Update for the Live-Action Adaptation
Filming of the second live-action adaptation has now officially begun! This was announced by director Dean DeBlois and Universal Pictures via social media. But that's not all: there is also news regarding the cast!
https://kinocheck.com/news/1x5qfb

08:07 Tobey Maguire in Avengers Doomsday: Alleged Leak of the Opening Scene!
Several well-known insiders have reported on the alleged opening scene, which is said to eclipse everything that superhero movies have ever shown at the beginning. Beware: There is a risk of spoilers if there is any truth to the rumors!
https://kinocheck.com/news/euh4r7

09:16 Dwayne Johnson to Return as the Scorpion King for The Mummy 4
According to well-known insider Daniel Richtman, Universal Pictures is planning to bring Johnson back as the Scorpion King for "The Mummy 4". The character was introduced in 2001's "The Mummy Returns" and served as the central antagonist.
https://kinocheck.com/news/0s660r

10:34 The Brave and the Bold: Screenwriter Hired for New DCU Batman Film
Finally, some progress on the new DCU Batman! With "The Brave and the Bold", we are getting a second Dark Knight alongside Robert Pattinson – and now it looks like we know who's writing the story.
https://kinocheck.com/news/7dp1hp

11:28 Game of Thrones Sequel Series & Possible Feature Film About Aegon's Conquest!
New projects from Westeros are already being worked on behind the scenes. These include a sequel series and a possible feature film about "Aegon's Conquest".
https://kinocheck.com/news/m1tkry

13:11 Here are the 2026 Oscar Nominations!
The 98th Academy Awards ceremony will take place on March 15, 2026. As usual, the most important film event of the year will honor the outstanding actors, directors, screenwriters and co. for their achievements. The big surprise in the run-up: a new Oscar record was set!
https://kinocheck.com/news/8vmz4k

Note | News with courtesy of all involved publishers. | All Rights Reserved. #KinoCheck®
